attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The voters of this country deserve the right to an election. No body eligible to vote voted Gordon Brown into office. His had a number of failings including using our British troops as spin. Now that Gordon Brown has slid down in the polls he has ruled out an election this year and next. 

This shouldn’t be his decision to make and the British voters should have a right to an election no mater what party you vote for. 

In one way denying us a vote makes Gordon Brown just as bad as the Military rule in Burma.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
